gb-renfrewshire.description:
Non-violent direct action (NVDA) is fundamental to Extinction Rebellion's theory of change and has been critical to bringing about the political recognition the climate and ecological crisis has received over the past few years in the UK and around the world.

The training will provide an overview of NVDA and is open to all, whether you are already a part of Extinction Rebellion or would like to join the movement.

This training is 3 hours long (including breaks) and will explore:
- What NVDA is and how it can be used.
- What COVID means for direct action
- What an affinity group is and why it is important for NVDA
- Practical techniques in Body Blockading
- De-escalation practice for interaction with members of the public
- Legal briefing

Join here:

Topic: NVDA Training 
Time: Jan 23, 2021 05:00 PM London 
 
Join Zoom Meeting 
https://zoom.us/j/4426947764 

Meeting ID: 442 694 7764 
Find your local number to dial by location: https://zoom.us/u/acrT6RAQrA

gb-warrington.description:
XR North Meeting for all rebels!

There is so much to share with all our amazing rebels that we have decided to go to scheduling meetings for the whole of the North twice a month.

So next week we have a visit from Anneka and Diane to present to us the new 2021 UK actions strategy. This should be a presentation followed by a Q&A session for everyone to find out the thinking behind the new strategy and hopefully get some great ideas of how, even in the face of lock down, we can come together to push for the system change that it is increasingly so acutely obvious we need. 

Everyone is welcome, please share with your local groups‚Ä¶

 Let‚Äôs make 2021 the year that change happens! 

18:45-20:00 on Monday 18th January 2021.

UK Actions strategy 2021 presentation and Q&A.

https://zoom.us/j/94856558985
Meeting ID: 948 5655 8985
Passcode: Rebellion

nl-rotterdam.description:
(English after Dutch)
Een online meeting (tenzij anders vermeld) voor iedereen die ge√Ønteresseerd is om een steentje bij te dragen aan het 'Media & Communicatie' (M&C) team. 

Stuur ons een berichtje voor de meeting-link of als je ge√Ønteresseerd bent om mee te helpen met onze activiteiten.

Wat regelt het M&C team allemaal?
- Wij beheren de sociale media pagina's van XR Rotterdam (Facebook, Instagram en Twitter). Ook het beantwoorden van DM's bijvoorbeeld valt hier onder.
- Een deel van de teamleden schrijft persberichten als nodig.
- Ook zijn wij verantwoordelijk voor het vinden van fotografen of filmers, en we houden contact met hen. 
- Communicatie met andere teams binnen XR Rotterdam of het media team van XRNL.

---------------------

An online meeting (unless stated otherwise) for anyone interested in contributing to the 'Media & Communication' (M&C) team.

Send us a message for the meeting-link or if you are interested in helping out with our activities in general.

What does the M&C team do?
- We manage the social media pages of XR Rotterdam (Facebook, Instagram and Twitter). This also includes answering DM's.
- Some of the team members write press releases when needed.
- We are also responsible for finding photographers of videographers, and we keep in touch with them.
- Communication with other teams within XR Rotterdam and also with the media team of XRNL.

üåü 2020 has been a time of challenge and development for Extinction Rebellion. The movement has had to learn on its feet and adapt to a continuously changing landscape.

cz-czech-republic.description:
- 2020 tied with 2016 as the world‚Äôs hottest year
- It‚Äôs 2021 and our politicians continue to invest in projects that harm our future
- 2021 is an election year, we need to be back in rebellion stronger than ever before
- We need you to help us grow the movement to have the impact we need

Join this workshop to explore how we can promote our talks, meetings, and actions online during the pandemic to bring back inactive rebels to the movement and to attract new people to join XR.

In March 2021, we are planning a national action that all rebels can do in their local cities and towns. This will be supported by a campaign of talks, trainings and meetings to grow the movement and our skills to bring people to XR. This includes delivering over 15 online Heading for Extinction talks by the end of March.

We need every rebel to get involved in outreach. Outreach is everyone‚Äôs role.  If everyone does a little outreach, together we can achieve a lot!

We are preparing this workshop to give you the inspiration, ideas and practical tips you need to get involved in outreach.

In this workshop we will explore:

Using the power of momentum driven organising 
Using the power of personal connections 
Using facebook for promotion and outreach
Online and email outreach 
How to organise ourselves to do outreach and promotion

de-stuttgart.description:
Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en 

This online gathering aims to explore cultural difference, Western culture, colonisation, modern societies as well as Indigenous worldviews, perspectives and philosophies from around the world, including Australia, Africa, New Zealand and the Americas. 

Practical decolonial actions that flow from these perspectives will also be considered along with potential emergent decolonial futures. Formats will include presentations, interactive exercises in small breakout groups, and general questions and discussion.

This gathering will be hosted by XR Global Support Trainings and Regen 101 Working Group and will be facilitated by Dr. Yin Paradies, an Aboriginal-Asian-Anglo Australian of the Wakaya people from the Gulf of Carpentaria. He is a Professor of Race Relations at Deakin University, where he conducts research on racism and anti-racism as well as teaching and researching Indigenous knowledges and decoloniality. Yin is a climate and ecological activist who is committed to understanding and interrupting the devastating impacts of modern societies. 

He seeks meaningful mutuality of becoming and embodied kinship with all life through transformed ways of knowing, being, and doing that are grounded in wisdom, humility, respect, and generosity. He is a current Moora Moora resident, having moved to the mountain in 2020 to be in community, cultivate a closer connection to Country and engage in an ethos of down-shifted collective sufficiency, voluntary simplicity, frugality, direct democracy, and radical localisation.

While this is a "free" event we do invite participants to engage in the gift economy to support a local community climate change food growing group. 

Feel free to do so here:  PayPal.Me/YinParadies

Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en

us-pittsburgh.description:
ECO-ANXIETY
Empathy Cafe around the Regen 101 Workshop
------------------------------------------------------

Every last Saturday of the month, we sit together and share thoughts and feelings around material from the workshop REGEN 101, developed by Christie Wilson MGT, psychotherapist, and ecological activist.

You can download the Regen 101 Booklet here: https://ausrebellion.earth/docs/Regen101.pdf

We use the Empathy Circle format in our sharing. The method (by Edwin Rutsch) is simple and easy to learn. Each person has an opportunity to speak and be heard.

All are welcome, and we hope to see you there! 

-----------------------------------
LAST SATURDAY of the MONTH
at 9-11 am UTC - to calculate your timezone: https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html?iso=202101307T080000&p1=1440   

ONLINE: use Zoom App with the Meeting ID: 832 2890 0002 and Passcode: 912788 or click the link: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/83228900002?pwd=TTYzREwxVTNQNkRuTW1lSnB1UE9yZz09

DIAL by your location and enter Meeting ID - to find your local number: https://us02web.zoom.us/u/kepKNs8785

If you want to learn more about Empathy Circle before the call, you may watch 9 min. video (https://youtu.be/wyKW7Jebgck) but it is not absolutely necessary.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
The full schedule of Open Calls by XR Regenerative Cultures Global Support:  http://bit.ly/XR_OpenRegenCalls

us-southern-vermont.description:
Join Extinction Rebellion Vermont this winter as we read "All We Can Save: Truth, Courage, and Solutions for the Climate Crisis," edited by Ayana Elizabeth Johnson & Katharine K. Wilkinson. A collection of "provocative and illuminating essays from women at the forefront of the climate movement who are harnessing truth, courage, and solutions to lead humanity forward."

Register here: https://forms.gle/dv2vLn1jQ7cSPcHW8

Details:

Wednesdays, 6:30 - 7:30pm, February 3, 10, 17, 24, March 3, 10, 17, 24, 31, April  7

Meet weekly via Zoom for 60 minutes over 10 weeks, reading a section of the book prior to each meeting (~40 pages/week).

**Space is limited to provide space for rich dialogue. If there is enough interest, we may offer an additional meeting time (likely a weekend morning).

Register here: https://forms.gle/dv2vLn1jQ7cSPcHW8

More about the book: "There is a renaissance blooming in the climate movement: leadership that is more characteristically feminine and more faithfully feminist, rooted in compassion, connection, creativity, and collaboration. While it‚Äôs clear that women and girls are vital voices and agents of change for this planet, they are too often missing from the proverbial ‚Äútable.‚Äù More than a problem of bias, it‚Äôs a dynamic that sets us up for failure. To change everything, we need everyone. Intermixing essays with poetry and art, this book is both a balm and a guide for knowing and holding what has been done to the world, while bolstering our resolve never to give up on each other or our collective future. We must summon truth, courage, and solutions, to turn away from the brink and toward life-giving possibility. Curated by two climate leaders, this book is a collection and celebration of visionaries who are leading us on a path toward all we can save." (Source: allwecansave.earth)

gb-leicester.description:
üåü 2020 has been a time of challenge and development for Extinction Rebellion. The movement has had to learn on its feet and adapt to a continuously changing landscape.

üí≠ As part of our regenerative culture, we need space to reflect, learn and plan for the future and this visioning workshop has been designed with this in mind.

üí≠ The aim of the workshop is to give each person in the group a chance to express their visions for XR and be an integral part of the planning and decision-making process.

dk-denmark.description:
Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en 

This online gathering aims to explore cultural difference, Western culture, colonisation, modern societies as well as Indigenous worldviews, perspectives and philosophies from around the world, including Australia, Africa, New Zealand and the Americas. 

Practical decolonial actions that flow from these perspectives will also be considered along with potential emergent decolonial futures. Formats will include presentations, interactive exercises in small breakout groups, and general questions and discussion.

This gathering will be hosted by XR Global Support Trainings and Regen 101 Working Group and will be facilitated by Dr. Yin Paradies, an Aboriginal-Asian-Anglo Australian of the Wakaya people from the Gulf of Carpentaria. He is a Professor of Race Relations at Deakin University, where he conducts research on racism and anti-racism as well as teaching and researching Indigenous knowledges and decoloniality. Yin is a climate and ecological activist who is committed to understanding and interrupting the devastating impacts of modern societies. 

He seeks meaningful mutuality of becoming and embodied kinship with all life through transformed ways of knowing, being, and doing that are grounded in wisdom, humility, respect, and generosity. He is a current Moora Moora resident, having moved to the mountain in 2020 to be in community, cultivate a closer connection to Country and engage in an ethos of down-shifted collective sufficiency, voluntary simplicity, frugality, direct democracy, and radical localisation.

While this is a "free" event we do invite participants to engage in the gift economy to support a local community climate change food growing group. 

Feel free to do so here:  PayPal.Me/YinParadies

Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en

(English below)

*** Dette m√∏de er online p√• zoom. F√∏lg dette link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/85234443597
Vi skal selvf√∏lgelig nok s√∏rge for, at det bliver hyggeligt, selvom det er online. ***

Vi har brug for mange flere aktivister i Extinction Rebellion for at kunne r√•be endnu h√∏jere for klima- og milj√∏retf√¶rdighed! 

Vi har bl.a. brug for folk, der har mulighed for at engagere sig i vores arbejdsgrupper og hj√¶lpe os med at stable vores aktioner p√• benene, h√•ndtere vores sociale medier, unders√∏ge de juridiske konsekvenser af vores aktioner og meget mere. Hvis du har lyst og mulighed for dette, kan du v√¶re en k√¶mpe hj√¶lp i klimakampen. 

Kom til onboarding-m√∏de, hvis du er nysgerrig og gerne vil have mere information om de forskellige arbejdsgrupper, deres opgaver og ansvarsomr√•der, og hvordan vi kommunikerer i Extinction Rebellion. M√∏det er en nem m√•de at komme med i Extinction Rebellion og blive mere involveret i bev√¶gelsen. Vi vil bl.a. forklare, hvordan vores online platforme Mattermost og Base virker. Hvis du har lyst til, at vi hj√¶lper dig med at komme p√• dem, er du meget velkommen til at medbringe din computer.

Det er v√¶sentligt at alle, som er en del af en arbejdsgruppe, forst√•r og er enige om vores krav og principper. Derfor starter vi med at gennemg√• dem, s√• alle f√•r en bedre forst√•else af Extinction Rebellions DNA. 

* Denne begivenhed er p√• dansk, dog skal det n√¶vnes at n√¶sten al kommunikationen i XR foreg√•r p√• engelsk. Dato for det n√¶ste event p√• engelsk kommer snart.

V√¶r med til en hyggelig aften ‚Äì vi ser frem til at byde dig velkommen!
Hvis I har nogen sp√∏rgsm√•l, s√• bare skriv en kommentar her eller skriv til onboarding@xrdk.org

--- English ---

***This event will be in Danish. The next event in English will be in February. The date will come out soon.***

*** This meeting is online on zoom. Follow this link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/85234443597
We will of course make sure that it will be cozy and comfortable even though it's online. ***

We need more activists in Extinction Rebellion to be able to work even harder for climate and ecological justice!

Among other things, we need people who want to be involved in our working groups and help us plan action, handle social media, look into the legal consequences of our actions, and much more. If you can see yourself doing this, you can be a great help in the fight for climate justice. 

Join an onboarding meeting if you are curious and want more information about the different working groups, their tasks and responsibilities, and how we communicate in Extinction Rebellion. The meeting will be an easy opportunity to join XR and become more involved in the movement. Among other things, we will explain how our online platforms Mattermost and Base work. If you want us to help you get on the platforms, you are very welcome to bring your computer.

It is essential that everybody who is in a working group understand and agree with our demands and principles. Because of this, we will start out by going through these so everybody can get a better understanding of Extinction Rebellion‚Äôs DNA. 

Come join us for a cozy evening ‚Äì we are looking forward to welcoming you!
If you have any questions just post them here in the event or write us on onboarding@xrdk.org.

dk-denmark.description:
** ENGLISH BELOW **

Fredelig civil ulydighedstr√¶ning ‚Äî Bliv klar til opr√∏ret.

NY KORT TR√ÜNINGSFORMAT! 

Skal du med til nogle af Extinction Rebellion's kommende aktioner, eller er du m√•ske bare nysgerrig p√• hvad det der civil ulydighed egentlig er? S√• kom til en vores non-violent direct action (NVDA) tr√¶ninger i K√∏benhavn.

Tr√¶ningerne er √•bne og gratis for alle der har lyst til at l√¶re, hvordan ikke-voldelig civil ulydighed udf√∏res i praksis, og det er en perfekt mulighed for at blive kl√¶dt p√• til at deltage i XR‚Äôs aktioner.
Extinction Rebellion √∏nsker s√• vidt muligt at alle der deltager i XR‚Äôs aktioner, har deltaget i NVDA tr√¶ning f√∏rst, s√• har du planer om at deltage i kommende aktioner, s√• tag en ven i h√•nden og kom til en tr√¶ning eller kom og m√∏d nye venner.

Tr√¶ningen vil give dig v√¶rkt√∏jer til at udf√∏re ikke-voldelig civil ulydighed, og tr√¶ningen vil bl.a. inkludere:

‚Ä¢ Beslutningstagning under aktioner
‚Ä¢ Deeskalering
‚Ä¢ Politi interaktion
‚Ä¢ Info om potentielle juridiske konsekvenser

Du vil l√¶re hvordan man snakker med politiet og offentligheden under aktioner. Du vil l√¶re om b√¶redygtig og regenerativ aktivisme, og du vil helt konkret l√¶re at praktisere teknikker til ikke-voldelig civil ulydighed.

Vi h√•ber p√• at se folk i alle aldre og folk fra forskellige baggrunde. Det er ikke et krav at du er med i Extinction Rebellion, og der er heller ikke krav om, at du skal v√¶re med efterf√∏lgende ‚Äî men har du lyst er du selvf√∏lgelig altid velkommen i XR!

Forbered dig hjemmefra, ved at se playlisten med intro vidoerne der uploades her:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jKyJnIkf7aU...

Har du sp√∏rgsm√•l til begivenheden er du velkommen til at stille dem her, s√• skal vi besvare dem efter bedste evner!

‚Äî ENGLISH ‚Äî
Non-Violent Direct Action training ‚Äî get ready for the rebellion!

NEW SHORT TRAINING FORMAT

Are you planning to join the the upcoming actions with Extinction Rebellion Denmark? Or are you perhaps curious about what civil disobedience is? Then join us at our next Non-violent direct action (NVDA) training in Copenhagen.

Our trainings are open to everyone no matter your age, where you are from, where you live or how you define yourself, and it is not a requirement that you are already a part of Extinction Rebellion or that you are planning to be after. But we of course welcome you with open arms if you want to be.
It is free to participate.

The training is the perfect opportunity to learn about how NVDA is carried out in practice, and it will prepare you to participate in XR‚Äôs actions or any other NVDA actions you find interesting. In XR we prefer that everyone who participate in our actions are well prepared and have participated in a training, so bring a friend or come alone, and let‚Äôs prepare for the rebellion together.

Our will prepare you for doing NVDA, covering elements such as:

‚Ä¢ an introduction to XR and NVDA
‚Ä¢ decision-making during actions
‚Ä¢ body and voice control
‚Ä¢ deescalation
‚Ä¢ interaction with the police
‚Ä¢ potential legal consequences

Prepare from home, by seeing the playlist with intro videos which will be uploaded here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jKyJnIkf7aU...

It is important that everyone that participate watch the videos before the training, so we have the same information and can move on from that together.

If you have any questions, feel free to post them here and we will do our very best to answer them.


Love & Rage
Extinction Rebellion KBH

Kom til f√¶lles workshop med alle rebeller i K√∏benhavn!

Workshoppen er √•ben for alle uanset om du har v√¶ret med i XR i lang tid, eller du er helt ny. Vi vil dele vigtige beskeder & nyheder omkring projekter i XR og skabe forbindelser p√• tv√¶rs af arbejdsgrupper, affinitetsgrupper & helt nye rebeller.

Til denne workshop vil den nationale aktionsgruppe facilitere diskussioner vedr√∏rende det kommende for√•rsopr√∏r i 2021! H√∏r om hvilke planer der er blevet lagt, og f√• indflydelse p√• de videre strategier. 

Der vil v√¶re pauser og energizere undervejs for at g√∏re workshoppen rar og vedholde energien, selvom det bliver online :)

________________________________________________________________________

Come to an open assembly for all rebels in Copenhagen!

The workshop is open to everyone, regardless of whether you have been with XR for a long time or you are completely new. We will share important messages & news about projects in XR and create connections across workgroups, affinity groups & new rebels.

For this workshop, the National Action Group will facilitate discussions regarding the upcoming spring rebellion in 2021! Hear about their proposals for plans and get influence on developing the further strategies.

There will be breaks and energizers along the way to make the workshop nice and maintain the energy, now that it is online :)

(English below)

*** Dette m√∏de er online p√• zoom. F√∏lg dette link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/85234443597
Vi skal selvf√∏lgelig nok s√∏rge for, at det bliver hyggeligt, selvom det er online. ***

Vi har brug for mange flere aktivister i Extinction Rebellion for at kunne r√•be endnu h√∏jere for klima- og milj√∏retf√¶rdighed! 

Vi har bl.a. brug for folk, der har mulighed for at engagere sig i vores arbejdsgrupper og hj√¶lpe os med at stable vores aktioner p√• benene, h√•ndtere vores sociale medier, unders√∏ge de juridiske konsekvenser af vores aktioner og meget mere. Hvis du har lyst og mulighed for dette, kan du v√¶re en k√¶mpe hj√¶lp i klimakampen. 

Kom til onboarding-m√∏de, hvis du er nysgerrig og gerne vil have mere information om de forskellige arbejdsgrupper, deres opgaver og ansvarsomr√•der, og hvordan vi kommunikerer i Extinction Rebellion. M√∏det er en nem m√•de at komme med i Extinction Rebellion og blive mere involveret i bev√¶gelsen. Vi vil bl.a. forklare, hvordan vores online platforme Mattermost og Base virker. Hvis du har lyst til, at vi hj√¶lper dig med at komme p√• dem, er du meget velkommen til at medbringe din computer.

Det er v√¶sentligt at alle, som er en del af en arbejdsgruppe, forst√•r og er enige om vores krav og principper. Derfor starter vi med at gennemg√• dem, s√• alle f√•r en bedre forst√•else af Extinction Rebellions DNA. 

* Denne begivenhed er p√• dansk, dog skal det n√¶vnes at n√¶sten al kommunikationen i XR foreg√•r p√• engelsk. Dato for det n√¶ste event p√• engelsk kommer snart.

V√¶r med til en hyggelig aften ‚Äì vi ser frem til at byde dig velkommen!
Hvis I har nogen sp√∏rgsm√•l, s√• bare skriv en kommentar her eller skriv til onboarding@xrdk.org

--- English ---

***This event will be in Danish. The next event in English will be in February. The date will come out soon.***

*** This meeting is online on zoom. Follow this link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/85234443597
We will of course make sure that it will be cozy and comfortable even though it's online. ***

We need more activists in Extinction Rebellion to be able to work even harder for climate and ecological justice!

Among other things, we need people who want to be involved in our working groups and help us plan action, handle social media, look into the legal consequences of our actions, and much more. If you can see yourself doing this, you can be a great help in the fight for climate justice. 

Join an onboarding meeting if you are curious and want more information about the different working groups, their tasks and responsibilities, and how we communicate in Extinction Rebellion. The meeting will be an easy opportunity to join XR and become more involved in the movement. Among other things, we will explain how our online platforms Mattermost and Base work. If you want us to help you get on the platforms, you are very welcome to bring your computer.

It is essential that everybody who is in a working group understand and agree with our demands and principles. Because of this, we will start out by going through these so everybody can get a better understanding of Extinction Rebellion‚Äôs DNA. 

Come join us for a cozy evening ‚Äì we are looking forward to welcoming you!
If you have any questions just post them here in the event or write us on onboarding@xrdk.org.

Du hast unsere Rebellionswelle mitverfolgt und mit uns mitgefiebert? Du hast genug davon, wegzuschauen, was mit unserem Planeten und unserer Zukunft wegen der Klimakrise und dem √∂kologischen Kollaps passiert? Du willst endlich von der Ohnmacht in die Handlung kommen? Du kennst XR und willst dich einbringen, wei√üt aber nicht genau wie und wo?
Dann ist der XR Infotag der richtige Ort f√ºr dich. 

Ab sofort findet der Kennenlerntermin jeden letzten Samstag im Monat online statt. 

Die drei Teile des Programms: 

14 Uhr: "XR Talk  - Aktuelle Fakten zu Klimakrise und √∂kologischem Kollaps und was wir dagegen tun k√∂nnen"  

16 Uhr: "Aktiv werden bei XR"
Infos zu Arbeitsweise, Organisationsstruktur erhalten und deinen eigenen Platz bei XR finden. 

18 Uhr: "XR Caf√©"
In einem Raum mit neuen und alten Aktivisti zum Kennenlernen, Austausch, zur Vertiefung von Beziehungen und Vernetzung aller Rebels und Interessierten. 


In einer Gruppe von gleichgesinnten interessierten Menschen finden wir gemeinsam heraus, wie jede*r sich einbringen kann und will.

Alles was du sowieso gern tust, ist auch bei uns willkommen und kann m√∂glicherweise einen gro√üen Unterschied f√ºr uns machen.

Alle sind willkommen. Du z√§hlst. Was du tust, z√§hlt.

at-niederosterreich.title: XR Infotag

at-niederosterreich.description:
Online Workshop zu aktuellen Aspekten der multiplen Krisen und einer mobilisierenden Kommunikation dar√ºber. :

Liebe Rebellinnen und Rebellen,

wir laden euch herzlich zum XR Lernraum: Science, Communication & Facilitation ein.

"Facilitation" bezieht sich auf uns selbst und auf die Menschen, mit denen wir kommunizieren. Wir wollen zugleich anderen und uns dabei helfen, √ºber die Themen von XR und √ºber XR selbst besser und aktivierender zu kommunizieren.  :speaking_head: 

Wir m√∂chten in diesem Raum unser Wissen √ºber die multiplen Krisen der Gegenwart gemeinsam vertiefen, mit dem Ziel, dieses Wissen auch mit Zielgruppen au√üerhalb unserer Bubble zu teilen. Wir wollen uns deshalb bei unseren Treffen

    - mit aktuellen Themen besch√§ftigen (durch Impulsvortr√§ge, Zusendung von Unterlagen, Unterst√ºtzung in der Recherchearbeit),
    - gemeinsam planen, eine bestimmte Gruppe zu einem Thema anzusprechen (z.B. Leute im privaten Umfeld, Kolleginnen und Kollegen, Journalist:innen, Politiker:innen, Menschen in der Landwirtschaft ...)
    - zusammen reflektieren, welchen Erfolg unsere Kommunikation hatte und was wir daraus lernen k√∂nnen.

Beispiel:
Wir entscheiden uns dazu, das Thema B√ºrger:innenr√§ten f√ºr die Kommunikation mit Menschen aufzubereiten, die in der Kommunalpolitik aktiv sind. Wir informieren uns selbst √ºber den Stand der Diskussion und planen, wen wir bei welcher Gelegenheit ansprechen (einzeln oder in kleinen Gruppen). Bei unserem n√§chsten Treffen berichten wir √ºber den Erfolg oder Misserfolg dieser Kommunikation und √ºberlegen, was gut funktioniert hat und wir besser machen k√∂nnen.

F√ºr jeden Abschnitt √ºberlegen wir uns also ein Thema, eine Zielgruppe und einen oder mehrere Kan√§le.

F√ºr den Gruppenprozess w√§re es vorteilhaft, wenn ihr an m√∂glichst allen vier Terminen teilnehmen k√∂nnt.

Vorschau f√ºr den 12.1.
Beim ersten Termin werden wir mit einen Impuls zum aktuellen Stand der Klimakrise starten.
Wir werden uns auch Zeit nehmen, uns gegenseitig kennen zu lernen und von euren Erfahrungen und vielleicht auch schon vorhandenen Ideen zu erfahren, wo ihr bereits konkrete Handlungsfelder seht.
Das Konzept f√ºr den Lernraum ist neu und wir m√∂chten es ausprobieren. Wir freuen und deshalb nicht nur, wenn ihr euch anmeldet und mitmacht, sondern auch, wenn ihr Vorschl√§ge und Kritik zur Gestaltung des Lernraums habt.

Wir freuen uns auf den gemeinsamen Weg des Erforschens, Lernens und Handelns! 

Anmeldung bitte bis So, 10.1.2021  unter info@xrebellion.at  

Liebe Gr√º√üe,

XR-Lernraum-Team

Join us for this month's People's Assembly

New Year, New Rebels!
One of the biggest parts of growing our movement and increasing our impact is the welcoming of new rebels. On Wed 20 Jan we'll be chatting about:
  * What was your experience as a brand new rebel?
  * How do you welcome new rebels into your group?
  * How can we empower more rebels to pick up roles?

Come join us and share your experiences with your fellow rebels!

Sign up for the PA here: https://actionnetwork.org/events/assembly-new-year-new-rebels/

Everything discussed will be fed to the Communities and Rebel Pathways teams so that we can share the best ideas across the movement and try to support the needs which arise.

This session is part of a monthly program of assemblies run by the Communities Team to feed your needs into the work we do for you. We want to hear of successes and challenges you face in your local areas so that we can help each other!

UK Communities Assemblies - 3rd Wednesday of every month

gb-cambridge.description:
REBELLION OF ONE | Cambridge Briefing | Wednesday Jan 20th, 7:30pm-9pm

‚ÄúIf putting my body in the road is what it takes to call attention to this, then I am terrified enough to do it.‚Äù

Rebellion Of One is a single-person roadblock, times 1,000. At midday on 27th March (and subsequent days and times, to be agreed) individuals across the UK (seemingly spontaneously) sit down in the road, alone, in front of traffic. They wear a sandwich board with a simple and emotive message. They remain sitting in the road until they choose to move, or are moved.

Wait, what? Single person roadblock? That sounds dangerous. Yes, it is. Each protester will be accompanied by a secret support team, hiding in plain sight amongst the passersby on the pavement.

This briefing will go over the strategy, objectives and preparation pathway of Rebellion of One. There will be opportunity to ask questions.

gb-cambridge.title: Leading Listening Circles - Tuesday Workshop

gb-cambridge.description:
What is it? A one hour interactive online workshop for you and your family about the climate and ecosystems. We will learn about some of the science behind the climate crisis and what you can do about it. There will be time to ask your questions, as well as some opportunity for creativity and competition! No prior knowledge is required - just an open mind and curiosity to learn more. There will be parts of the workshop where parents/carers and children will need to work together, and you will probably want a pen and paper too.

Who is it for? The workshop is aimed at parents/carers and children aged 7-14, but other ages are also welcome. Please make sure that children are accompanied at all times during the workshop.

When and where? The workshop is on zoom on Tuesday 19th December from 6-7pm on Zoom. It's the first time we've run this so please bear with us as we try out our brand new workshop script and iron out any issues. Please use this zoom link to join us02web.zoom.us/j/81418282448 or use the zoom ID 814 1828 2448

Who is running it? We are a group of people who work in education in the Cambridgeshire area and know each other through Extinction Rebellion.

Any questions? Contact us at xr_cam_teachers_for_truth@protonmail.com.

The workshop will be run by teachers and educators. At least one workshop host will be a teacher with a DBS check. Please ensure that children are supervised at all times.

Cette formation s'adresse √† toute personne souhaitant s'impliquer activement dans le mouvement Extinction Rebellion.

Nous reprendrons ensemble les principes de base de la d√©sob√©issance civile non-violente : Pourquoi la d√©sob√©issance civile non-violente comme outil ? Comment s'organiser concr√®tement ? Comment orienter son combat pour esp√©rer obtenir une justice pour le climat ?
Informations pratiques

Dates : Dimanche 7 f√©vrier

Horaire : Rendez-vous √† 10h00, fin aux alentours de 16h30.

Lieu : Maison de Quartier - Espace Bel-Air, Rue du Nord 12, 1800 Vevey (10-15 min √† pied de la gare de Vevey / bus 202, 211 arr√™t Vevey, Nord)
 

Prix libre

Nous sugg√©rons 20.- en tant que donation √† XR Suisse. Nous ne souhaitons pas que le prix freine des personnes √† suivre cette formation: tout le monde est bienvenu et vous donnez ce que vous voulez !

Dispositions sanitaires

Nous prenderons en compte la situation sanitaire lorsque les consignes pour f√©vrier 2021 seront connues.

 

Des boissons non-alcoolis√©es seront √† disposition des participant-e-s. La formation comportera une pause de 50 minutes. Merci d'amener un petit quelque chose √† manger (v√©g√©tarien ou vegan de pr√©f√©rence), ou une petite confection de votre choix, afin que nous partagions ensemble un moment convivial.

Le nombre de participant-e-s est limit√© √† 25 personnes par date.

D√©construisons un mythe

Vous n'√™tes pas oblig√©-e-s de prendre des risques juridiques pour vous engager dans XR. Chacun-e s'engage comme il/elle le souhaite :)

Pour toutes questions, nous vous prions d'√©crire √† : xr-riviera@riseup.net


Avec Amour et Rage.

This is a participatory event and open to all!

We will ringing in the new year by proclaiming our 2021 Climate Resolutions!

We are also going to take time to address the attempted coup that took place on January 6tth.  This is the antithesis of what Extinction Rebellion stands for. We watched large groups of insurrectionist promoting white supremacy, anti-Semitism, and ultra-nationalist ideologies in a violent way. In this community meeting, we would like to reinforce our commitment to a Just Transition that includes all people, and prioritize the need for a people‚Äôs democracy (Citizen's Assemblies) and the principles behind our Non-Violent Direct Action.

au-central-coast.title: Regen 101 Online - 3 hour Workshop

au-central-coast.description:
Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en 

This online gathering aims to explore cultural difference, Western culture, colonisation, modern societies as well as Indigenous worldviews, perspectives and philosophies from around the world, including Australia, Africa, New Zealand and the Americas. 

Practical decolonial actions that flow from these perspectives will also be considered along with potential emergent decolonial futures. Formats will include presentations, interactive exercises in small breakout groups, and general questions and discussion.

This gathering will be hosted by XR Global Support Trainings and Regen 101 Working Group and will be facilitated by Dr. Yin Paradies, an Aboriginal-Asian-Anglo Australian of the Wakaya people from the Gulf of Carpentaria. He is a Professor of Race Relations at Deakin University, where he conducts research on racism and anti-racism as well as teaching and researching Indigenous knowledges and decoloniality. Yin is a climate and ecological activist who is committed to understanding and interrupting the devastating impacts of modern societies. 

He seeks meaningful mutuality of becoming and embodied kinship with all life through transformed ways of knowing, being, and doing that are grounded in wisdom, humility, respect, and generosity. He is a current Moora Moora resident, having moved to the mountain in 2020 to be in community, cultivate a closer connection to Country and engage in an ethos of down-shifted collective sufficiency, voluntary simplicity, frugality, direct democracy, and radical localisation.

While this is a "free" event we do invite participants to engage in the gift economy to support a local community climate change food growing group. 

Feel free to do so here:  PayPal.Me/YinParadies

Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en

au-central-coast.description:
Non-violent direct action or peaceful civil disobedience has a long history of success in achieving large change, from the Indian Independence Movement to the Civil Rights Movement.

At this NVDA workshop, you'll become empowered with these skills, so you can join Extinction Rebellion in taking climate action now.

The training covers the principles of non-violent direct action, why it works, the definition of non-violence, a legal rights briefing, and role-plays to get you ready for common peaceful civil disobedience scenarios

gb-northern-ireland.description:
XRNI Regenerative Culture and Wellbeing are delighted to invite you to join this one-hour session with Louise Taylor and Alexey Janes on wellbeing in challenging times. 

Louise and Alexey will do a short presentation on wellbeing and self-care tools and techniques and then facilitate a group sharing on all things mindful, meaningful, and peaceful. 

Louise is a currently a PhD student at Queen‚Äôs University Belfast studying the relationship between Nature and Mental Health. She is also a qualified counsellor and coach with a particular interest in ecotherapy and ecopsychology. 

Alexey‚Äôs current work involves the delivery of wild wellness and wellbeing sessions. He has worked on a wide range of community-based projects in Scotland and Northern Ireland, focussed on the connection between people and the natural environment.

gb-morecambe-bay.description:
Join us for this month's People's Assembly

New Year, New Rebels!
One of the biggest parts of growing our movement and increasing our impact is the welcoming of new rebels. On Wed 20 Jan we'll be chatting about:
  * What was your experience as a brand new rebel?
  * How do you welcome new rebels into your group?
  * How can we empower more rebels to pick up roles?

Come join us and share your experiences with your fellow rebels!

Sign up for the PA here: https://actionnetwork.org/events/assembly-new-year-new-rebels/

Everything discussed will be fed to the Communities and Rebel Pathways teams so that we can share the best ideas across the movement and try to support the needs which arise.

This session is part of a monthly program of assemblies run by the Communities Team to feed your needs into the work we do for you. We want to hear of successes and challenges you face in your local areas so that we can help each other!

UK Communities Assemblies - 3rd Wednesday of every month

gb-morecambe-bay.description:
Our regular monthly open meeting but we are being a bit different for a dark January night.   Bring a drink, your supper, a mug of tea . . . we will be having a relaxed sharing of stories about events and actions we've been involved in over the years.  XR and way before XR.  We will also focus on dreaming up ideas for actions in the year ahead. 

We did a similar activity in December which worked well.  This is about connecting and inspiring each other. 
It will be followed up in February with some more detailed planning for the year ahead.
 Zoom link . . . . 
 https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81310965442 
 Everyone is very welcome - for anyone new to XR - this is  a friendly way to meet others, for folks engaged already - a way to build our community and get to know one another better.  We are all crew . . none of us are professional storytellers yet we all have stories to tell . . . of HS2; of Preston New Rd, of polar bears and coal pits, of lying down in Market Square, of dancing discobedience on Morecambe Prom, of boats in the middle of London, of Greehnam  . . . of wild red rebels up on Clougha . . . . All very relaxed and informal - come and tell us all what actions inspired, scared, infuriated, changed you . . . .

The meetings will be an opportunity to hear what‚Äôs going on, discuss, plan, get to know each other better ‚Äì and forge a Nottingham XR fit for the post Covid world.

Each meeting will be different and try and go with the flow of those who attend so please feel free to come along to as many as you wish too!

de-berlin.description:
*** English below ***

EXTINCTION REBELLION BERLIN ONBOARDING-TREFFEN

Fragst du dich, was Extinction Rebellion eigentlich ist? Was sie genau machen? Wie sie sich organisieren und warum sie das alles √ºberhaupt machen? Spielst du vielleicht mit dem Gedanken, selbst der Rebellion beizutreten? Hast du bereits an einigen Veranstaltungen teilgenommen, bist du unseren Online Plattformen beigetreten, aber hast immer noch offene Fragen?

Dann k√∂nnte eines unserer regelm√§√üig stattfindenden Onboarding-Treffen etwas f√ºr dich sein. Hier bekommst du ein erstes Verst√§ndnis unserer Prinzipien, Forderungen, unserer Organisationsstruktur und unseren Entscheidungsprozessen und ein grunds√§tzliches Gef√ºhl daf√ºr, wie wir zusammenarbeiten. Angeleitet von aktiven Extinction Rebellion Mitgliedern wirst du auch Gelegenheit bekommen, verschiedene M√∂glichkeiten zu entdecken, dich selbst mit deinen W√ºnschen und Bed√ºrfnissen einzubringen.

Link: https://b.extinctionrebellion.de/b/ber-shg-l8p

***************************************************************

EXTINCTION REBELLION BERLIN NEW REBEL ONBOARDING

Have you found yourself wondering what Extinction Rebellion actually is? What they do exactly? How they organize themselves and why they do the things they do? Are you toying with the idea of becoming a Rebel yourself? Have you attended a few meetings, joined our online platforms, and feel a little lost?

Our New Rebel Onboarding Session (held regularly) might be just right for you. It is designed to give you an understanding of our principles, demands, our organizational structure and decision-making structures, and a general feeling for how we collaborate. Facilitated by active members of Extinction Rebellion, you‚Äôll get the chance to figure out how to get involved with your individual needs and interests.


Link: https://b.extinctionrebellion.de/b/ber-shg-l8p

gb-bristol.description:
George Monbiot, Bristol 

This event is delayed till 2021. All tickets are still valid for the new date. 

WE will email all paying ticket holders in January to confirm the new date. 

WE will also issue refunds if required through the eventbrite ticket page. 

George Monbiot comes to Bristol to discuss The Invisible Ideology Trashing Our Planet.

This three hour event will allow George and the audience to really delve deep into the damage that big business, media, advertising and mindless consumerism are having on our planet how we as individuals can help to solve these global issues.

15 short videos or the two hour full length video availble at the link below. 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTij8wOSJZNx2yTIo8Veeg4hkZF3nxTFQ

Tickets 
We are offering loads of low cost tickets for students so please share with friends as these event sell out fast! 

About George Monbiot: 
George is an author, Guardian columnist and environmental campaigner. His best-selling books include Feral: Rewilding the land, Sea and human life and Heat: how to stop the planet burning; his latest is Out of the Wreckage: a new politics for an age of crisis. He writes a weekly column for The Guardian, and is the author of a number of books, including Captive State: The Corporate Takeover of Britain (2000), Feral, Searching for the enchantment on the Frontiers of Rewilding (2013) and Out of the Wreckage: A New Politics in the Age of Crisis (2017).
In Bristol last year we filmed an amazing series of talks from George connecting the dots between climate emergency, mental health and consumerism. 

George Monbiot‚Äôs website  - https://www.monbiot.com
Music 

 Tallulah Rendall has been blessing festivals and the Bristol music scene for many years with a mix of folk, rock and inspirational healing sounds for the mind and body.  Check out some of Tallulah's amazing music here - https://www.tallulahrendall.com

Details 
There is a bar and cafe on site serving food and drinks so you can meet friends early if you like. 

Door open at 6pm
Show starts at 7pm.

There will be no entry after 7pm so please arrive early. 

------------

Here are some videos from the last event we produced with George in Bristol. Please subscribe to LOVE IT TV and share this content far and wide!!!

V1 - George Monbiot - What does declaring a climate emergency actually mean?
https://youtu.be/2009H__4jGE

V2 -George Monbiot challenges the BBC to go further in naming and confronting power
https://youtu.be/Wh26c_7qPH0

V3 - George Monbiot - Celebrity is the mask the machine wears.

gb-north-east.description:
Join us for this month's People's Assembly

New Year, New Rebels!
One of the biggest parts of growing our movement and increasing our impact is the welcoming of new rebels. On Wed 20 Jan we'll be chatting about:
  * What was your experience as a brand new rebel?
  * How do you welcome new rebels into your group?
  * How can we empower more rebels to pick up roles?

Come join us and share your experiences with your fellow rebels!

Sign up for the PA here: https://actionnetwork.org/events/assembly-new-year-new-rebels/

Everything discussed will be fed to the Communities and Rebel Pathways teams so that we can share the best ideas across the movement and try to support the needs which arise.

This session is part of a monthly program of assemblies run by the Communities Team to feed your needs into the work we do for you. We want to hear of successes and challenges you face in your local areas so that we can help each other!

UK Communities Assemblies - 3rd Wednesday of every month

us-new-york-ny.description:
Dive into Extinction Rebellion‚Äôs analysis of the climate and ecological emergency, why our society has failed to address it, and our strategy for success. Gain insight into what makes Extinction Rebellion tick during this presentation and discussion. Learn how you can be part of the action.  

We‚Äôre living in a time of global crisis. We bear witness to the effects of our government‚Äôs inability to respond to the existential threats of the climate and ecological emergency, the COVID-19 pandemic and the ravages of a long history of systemic racism. Facing these threats alone can be overwhelming.  Join us to hear how Extinction Rebellion is bringing people together to act now and avoid total climate breakdown.  
This talk will lay out the basic climate science that drives our urgency to act and outline how we can use nonviolent direct action to demand change. You may be interested in joining Extinction Rebellion or are just curious about what‚Äôs happening to the climate. Come to hear more about what humanity is facing in the next decade, what has to happen to prevent catastrophe, and to connect with others who are wrestling with these truths.  

Sign up here:
https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZYrcOygpz0qGtwmstozdiAX8Oqxua2D-Axk

it-italy.description:
ECO-ANXIETY
Empathy Cafe around the Regen 101 Workshop
------------------------------------------------------

Every last Saturday of the month, we sit together and share thoughts and feelings around material from the workshop REGEN 101, developed by Christie Wilson MGT, psychotherapist, and ecological activist.

You can download the Regen 101 Booklet here: https://ausrebellion.earth/docs/Regen101.pdf

We use the Empathy Circle format in our sharing. The method (by Edwin Rutsch) is simple and easy to learn. Each person has an opportunity to speak and be heard.

All are welcome, and we hope to see you there!

us-seattle.description:
Hey Earth, you're looking pretty hot today! No actually, we're very concerned...

Show your love for life on this planet by joining Extinction Rebellion this Valentine's Day at Pikes Place! We will be disrupting business as usual demanding climate action in the face of an unprecedented global ecological crisis. We will be at the entrance to Pike Place singing climate-themed love songs while writing love letters to the planet and to those lost in the sixth mass extinction. This will be a non-violent action, masks will be required and social distancing will be practiced.

Wij van de Regeneratieve Cultuur cirkel van Amsterdam zijn druk bezig geweest met nieuwe corona-proof manieren uitproberen waardoor we nog steeds kunnen samen komen om te werken, elkaar te ontmoeten, en onze beweging op te bouwen. Een van de dingen die we organiseren zijn Deep Focus sessies, wekelijks op maandag en vrijdag 10:00-12:00. Het doel hiervan is om een online ruimte te cre√´ren waar je geconcentreerd kan werken. De link naar onze Zoom meetings kun je hier vinden:

Hello all,
During this difficult and challenging period of uncertainty, we need each other more than ever. We of the Regenerative Culture circle of Amsterdam have been busy trying out new corona-proof ways to still come together to work, meet, and build our movement. One thing we are going to organise are Deep Focus sessions, on Monday‚Äôs and Friday's 10:00-12:00. The purpose of this is to create an online space for focused working. This can be XR-related, or your own work. We hope you will join us for some much needed concentration and motivation!

Here's the link for the recurring Deep Focus Sessions:

nl-amsterdam.title: Deep Focus

nl-amsterdam.description:
Dear rebels,

How do you stay true to yourself and interact with others in a positive way when you address the climate and ecological crisis? What can you do when someone gets angry about it or you get emotional yourself?

Extinction Rebellion (XR) is a nonviolent social movement addressing the climate and ecological crisis. For that, we need to develop new skills that help us to act and respond consciously, with skills that help us minimize harm. Nonviolent Communication (NVC) is a way of making contact that provides insights and choices regarding how we express what‚Äôs important to us while staying in connection with others.

Follow a free online Nonviolent Communication training to learn:
- How to find personal grounding and calm (via inner dialogue).
- How to differentiate between judgments & their underlying message.
- How to differentiate between behaviours & their underlying drivers/intentions.
- How to ‚Äúdisarm‚Äù and connect via empathic listening skills.
 
The introductory training which lasts 2 hours will be followed up a week later with practice sessions. These are for learning by doing - practising NVC by using the four steps for inner clarity and roleplaying, using participants‚Äô real-life situations. The training is offered in English by Tamara (www.tamaracatharina.com).
 
Part 1
What: introduction to non-violent communication.
When: Tuesday 9 February 10:00-12:00
Where: Online via Zoom

Part 2
What: non-violent communication practice
When: Tuesday 16 February 10:00-12:00
Where: Online via Zoom


Subscribe here:
https://forms.gle/6rgq87McvjZVvTDr5

nl-utrecht.description:
--English Below--

LUCHTALARM = KLIMAATALARM üö® 
Stil klimaatprotest bij Utrecht CS (onder het bolletjesdak!)

Hoe laat: tussen 11:30 en 12:30 ‚åö
Waar: Stationsplein, Utrecht CS üöÇ
Details: Op elke eerste maandag van de maand vindt om 12 uur ‚Äôs middags ‚Äì als het luchtalarm afgaat ‚Äì in een aantal steden gelijktijdig een klimaatprotest plaats. Met deze actie wil Extinction Rebellion NL aandacht vragen voor de klimaatcrisis en de biodiversiteitscrisis en duidelijk maken dat het al vijf over twaalf is. Sluit je voor een paar minuten aan bij deze actie en laat zien dat je ook vindt dat de overheid in actie moet komen om een leefbare toekomst voor ons en onze kinderen te waarborgen.

Uiteraard houden we anderhalve meter afstand. Neem een mondmasker en je zelfgemaakte protestbord mee!

English:
On every first monday of the month, at 12 noon (when the air-raid alarm will sound all over the Netherlands) there will be silent climate protests in a number of Dutch cities. üö®

Time: between 11:30 and 12:30 ‚åö
Where: Stationsplein, Utrecht Central Station (underneath the bubble roof!)üöÇ
Details: With this action, Extinction Rebellion NL wants to draw attention to the climate and biodiversity crisis and highlight that we‚Äôre in the twelfth hour already. Join us for a couple of minutes to show that you want the government to act now to safeguard a viable future for us and our children. üë∂

Naturally, we will respect social distancing. Bring your face mask and customised protest sign!

- What do we want?

- What are our principles and values?

- How are we organized?

- Learn how you can get involved!

us-salt-lake-city.title: Extinction Rebellion Orientation

us-salt-lake-city.description:
We‚Äôre living in a time of global crisis, bearing witness to the effects of our government‚Äôs inability to respond to the existential threats of the climate and ecological emergency, the COVID-19 pandemic and the ravages of a long history of systemic racism. Facing these threats alone can be overwhelming.  Join us to hear how Extinction Rebellion is bringing people together to act now and avoid total climate breakdown.  
This talk will lay out the basic climate science that drives our urgency to act and outline how we can use nonviolent direct action to demand change. Whether you‚Äôre interested in joining Extinction Rebellion or just curious about what‚Äôs happening to the climate, come to hear more about what humanity is facing in the next decade, what has to happen to prevent catastrophe, and connect with others who are wrestling with these truths.   
Sign up here: https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZEqde2vqz4vE9Ir_Hg56qIN0vL6a33nUvtV

us-salt-lake-city.description:
The Climate Crisis is upon us, yet not many understand it. Join this presentation to learn about what's transforming our planets climate and what the Extinction Rebellion movement has to offer in response.

Learn more about the state of the climate emergency and what we can do about it. In this event you will hear details regarding the state of our planet's quickly change climate, along with the impacts it has to the environment. Then, we will explore the alternative approach Extinction Rebellion offers compared to what has been tried for the last 50 years.

gb-leeds.description:
A chance to get involved with 2 practical actions.  

We have 2 speakers Jed and Andy who will give brief introductions into what they are doing in Leeds to tackle poverty and needless consumption at the same time. We will then break into smaller groups to discuss how we can support these ideas. 

 

The 'Library of Things' is an exciting idea spreading across the UK.

The plan is to make borrowing better than buying.

This is:

More affordable and convenient

"90% of borrowers say they now have more money to spend on things important to them."

Socially rewarding

"75% of borrowers feel better connected to their community because of Library of Things."

Kinder to the planet

"Having used Library of Things, borrowers are 60% more likely to repair or recycle items."

Read more about it here: https://www.libraryofthings.co.uk/why

Jed is starting a Library of things in Leeds - come and find out how you can join in!

This idea can spread across the city.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Reducing carbon emissions from our homes is crucial to reach Net Zero Carbon.

Unless we massively reduce emissions from houses - indeed all buildings - we'll never reach Net Zero Carbon.

There are many other benefits too - including lots of green jobs and improved health for millions of people.

The Leeds Citizens' Jury made a strong recommendation to empower local community groups to insulate Leeds houses.

https://www.leedsclimate.org.uk/sites/default/files/CJ%20recommendations%20FINAL%20.pdf

Leeds City Council has done nothing to make this happen.

Andy Walker (aka Andy Van Traveller) is engaging communities to work together and encouraging individuals to fix their own homes.

This includes Insulation, Air-tightness improvement and the use of Air Source Heat Pumps.

Strong campaigning is needed as well as grass-roots action to raise the public awareness of what can be achieved - and then drive the politicians to make the funds available - both for training and for a huge installation programme.

Read more about it here: https://www.SUREinsulation.co.uk

Come and hear how to make your home warmer - and reduce your fuel bills and carbon emissions at the same time!

Both will be via this link 06:15 PM - 7:45PM
Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/462114343
Meeting ID: 462 114 343

 Let‚Äôs make 2021 the year that change happens!

gb-glasgow.description:
Non-violent direct action (NVDA) is fundamental to Extinction Rebellion's theory of change and has been critical to bringing about the political recognition the climate and ecological crisis has received over the past few years in the UK and around the world.

The training will provide an overview of NVDA and is open to all, whether you are already a part of Extinction Rebellion or would like to join the movement.

This training is 3 hours long (including breaks) and will explore:
- What NVDA is and how it can be used.
- What COVID means for direct action
- What an affinity group is and why it is important for NVDA
- Practical techniques in Body Blockading
- De-escalation practice for interaction with members of the public
- Legal briefing

Join here:

Topic: NVDA Training 
Time: Jan 23, 2021 05:00 PM London 
 
Join Zoom Meeting 
https://zoom.us/j/4426947764 

Meeting ID: 442 694 7764 
Find your local number to dial by location: https://zoom.us/u/acrT6RAQrA

Extinction Rebellion presents: 

How can activists and companies beat THE SYSTEM to create the so much needed shift towards sustainability? 


In this weekend, as a follow up from the successful Psychology of Climate Activists weekend earlier this year, we will explore the often overemphasized conflicts between ‚Äòbig business‚Äô and its environmental stakeholders.

Are you looking for ways to change business as usual with your everyday activism? Then this weekend is for you. Together we will explore a new concept ‚Äì effectivism.

How can YOU be a more effective activist?

us-los-angeles.description:
Come learn about and practice facilitation, in a community of peers, so we can have great meetings and deepen our regenerative practices.

Join XRLA and Ted Rau, from Sociocracy For All, for a 4 session Facilitation Training Series that will take place over 4 Monday evenings (1/25, 2/1, 2/8, 2/15) from 6-8PM PST.

If you have participated in the previous Facilitation Training run by XRLA in the late summer/early fall 2020, or ones produced by XRNYC, this training will allow for deepening of your skills and practice, but feel free to skip the first session on 1/25

It is best if you can attend the whole series as the concepts and practices build on each other, but if you can not make certain sessions, please come to those that you can!

Pay what you can - suggested donation of $40 to help XRLA cover part of the costs. 

Note: this link will give you access to all 4 sessions via 1 Zoom room. 

RSVP: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/the-rebellion-will-be-facilitated-tickets-135756167351

cz-ostrava.description:
- 2020 tied with 2016 as the world‚Äôs hottest year
- It‚Äôs 2021 and our politicians continue to invest in projects that harm our future
- 2021 is an election year, we need to be back in rebellion stronger than ever before
- We need you to help us grow the movement to have the impact we need

Join this workshop to explore how we can promote our talks, meetings, and actions online during the pandemic to bring back inactive rebels to the movement and to attract new people to join XR.

In March 2021, we are planning a national action that all rebels can do in their local cities and towns. This will be supported by a campaign of talks, trainings and meetings to grow the movement and our skills to bring people to XR. This includes delivering over 15 online Heading for Extinction talks by the end of March.

We need every rebel to get involved in outreach. Outreach is everyone‚Äôs role.  If everyone does a little outreach, together we can achieve a lot!

We are preparing this workshop to give you the inspiration, ideas and practical tips you need to get involved in outreach.

In this workshop we will explore:

Using the power of momentum driven organising 
Using the power of personal connections 
Using facebook for promotion and outreach
Online and email outreach 
How to organise ourselves to do outreach and promotion

gb-united-kingdom.description:
XR & Me in 2021
----------------------------
Empathy Cafe - 2 HOURS
hosted by Empathy Circles of XR Regen Global Support

Each person has an opportunity to speak and be heard. All are welcome, and we hope to see you there!

We use the Empathy Circle format in our sharing. The method (by Edwin Rutsch) is simple and easy to learn. 


THURSDAY, at 8-10 am UTC / to calculate your timezone: https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html?iso=20210114T080000&p1=1440   

ONLINE: https://zoom.us/j/707132135
Meeting ID 707 132 135

DIAL by your location and enter Meeting ID - to find your local number: https://us02web.zoom.us/u/kcE1kiCZa3 


If you want to learn more about Empathy Circle before the call, you may watch 9 min. video (https://youtu.be/wyKW7Jebgck) but it is not absolutely necessary.


The full schedule of Open Calls by XR Regenerative Cultures Global Support: 
http://bit.ly/Schedule_of_OpenRegenCalls

gb-united-kingdom.description:
Join us for this month's People's Assembly

New Year, New Rebels!
One of the biggest parts of growing our movement and increasing our impact is the welcoming of new rebels. On Wed 20 Jan we'll be chatting about:
  * What was your experience as a brand new rebel?
  * How do you welcome new rebels into your group?
  * How can we empower more rebels to pick up roles?

Come join us and share your experiences with your fellow rebels!

Sign up for the PA here: https://actionnetwork.org/events/assembly-new-year-new-rebels/

Everything discussed will be fed to the Communities and Rebel Pathways teams so that we can share the best ideas across the movement and try to support the needs which arise.

This session is part of a monthly program of assemblies run by the Communities Team to feed your needs into the work we do for you. We want to hear of successes and challenges you face in your local areas so that we can help each other!

UK Communities Assemblies - 3rd Wednesday of every month

cz-cheb.description:
- 2020 tied with 2016 as the world‚Äôs hottest year
- It‚Äôs 2021 and our politicians continue to invest in projects that harm our future
- 2021 is an election year, we need to be back in rebellion stronger than ever before
- We need you to help us grow the movement to have the impact we need

Join this workshop to explore how we can promote our talks, meetings, and actions online during the pandemic to bring back inactive rebels to the movement and to attract new people to join XR.

In March 2021, we are planning a national action that all rebels can do in their local cities and towns. This will be supported by a campaign of talks, trainings and meetings to grow the movement and our skills to bring people to XR. This includes delivering over 15 online Heading for Extinction talks by the end of March.

We need every rebel to get involved in outreach. Outreach is everyone‚Äôs role.  If everyone does a little outreach, together we can achieve a lot!

We are preparing this workshop to give you the inspiration, ideas and practical tips you need to get involved in outreach.

In this workshop we will explore:

Using the power of momentum driven organising 
Using the power of personal connections 
Using facebook for promotion and outreach
Online and email outreach 
How to organise ourselves to do outreach and promotion

gb-youth.description:
Regen 101 - EVERYONE IS REGEN CREW! 

**This workshop is from 11AM to 2PM AEDT**

Register here: https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=939276&lang=en

This is a wonderful introduction to Regenerative Cultures for those new to XR and an essential experience for those who are already involved in the movement.

The online workshop has been adapted from an original 6-hour face-to-face workshop.

Together we will cover: What are Regenerative Cultures & Earth Emotions, Self-care & burnout alongside Emotional debriefing.

The Regen 101 Workshop was created in response to the need for XR Working Groups, and the wider community, to understand Regenerative Cultures is an essential strategy for Extinction Rebellion. 

As a workshop, it is experiential, practical, and educational and weaves through the topics so that the group leaves with an understanding of embodied Regenerative Activism.

HOMEWORK: The Regen 101 Booklet can be downloaded here: https://ausrebellion.earth/docs/Regen101.pdf 

It is intended as a supportive reference as well as a valuable, stand-alone resource for Regenerative Cultures.

It is useful to read the booklet before attending the workshop.

Register here: https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=939276&lang=en

Its a new year and we're heading back into action, and back into our fortnightly meetings, every second Monday at 6:30pm.

There is a lot to discuss with the upcoming March Mass Disruption, reports from national and state meetings, along with organising postering and stalls!

New rebels always welcome!

https://us02web.zoom.us/j/5256267272...
Meeting ID: 525 626 7272
Passcode: 842991 See less

XR Darebin acknowledges that this action will take place on the stolen land of the Wurundjeri and Boon Wurrung people of the Kulin Nation. We pay our respects to their elders past, present and emerging. We know acknowledgement is limited without corresponding action. It is our intention to work for environmental and multi-species justice, and to continually address the question of how we can meaningfully understand, respond to, and participate in dismantling, ongoing colonial violence in this country.

gb-fort-william.description:
Non-violent direct action (NVDA) is fundamental to Extinction Rebellion's theory of change and has been critical to bringing about the political recognition the climate and ecological crisis has received over the past few years in the UK and around the world.

The training will provide an overview of NVDA and is open to all, whether you are already a part of Extinction Rebellion or would like to join the movement.

This training is 3 hours long (including breaks) and will explore:
- What NVDA is and how it can be used.
- What COVID means for direct action
- What an affinity group is and why it is important for NVDA
- Practical techniques in Body Blockading
- De-escalation practice for interaction with members of the public
- Legal briefing

Join here:

Topic: NVDA Training 
Time: Jan 23, 2021 05:00 PM London 
 
Join Zoom Meeting 
https://zoom.us/j/4426947764 

Meeting ID: 442 694 7764

be-belgium.description:
ECO-ANXIETY
Empathy Cafe around the Regen 101 Workshop
------------------------------------------------------

Every last Saturday of the month, we sit together and share thoughts and feelings around material from the workshop REGEN 101, developed by Christie Wilson MGT, psychotherapist, and ecological activist.

You can download the Regen 101 Booklet here: https://ausrebellion.earth/docs/Regen101.pdf

We use the Empathy Circle format in our sharing. The method (by Edwin Rutsch) is simple and easy to learn. Each person has an opportunity to speak and be heard.

All are welcome, and we hope to see you there! 

-----------------------------------
LAST SATURDAY of the MONTH
at 9-11 am UTC - to calculate your timezone: https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html?iso=202101307T080000&p1=1440   

ONLINE: use Zoom App with the Meeting ID: 832 2890 0002 and Passcode: 912788 or click the link: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/83228900002?pwd=TTYzREwxVTNQNkRuTW1lSnB1UE9yZz09

DIAL by your location and enter Meeting ID - to find your local number: https://us02web.zoom.us/u/kepKNs8785

If you want to learn more about Empathy Circle before the call, you may watch 9 min. video (https://youtu.be/wyKW7Jebgck) but it is not absolutely necessary.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
The full schedule of Open Calls by XR Regenerative Cultures Global Support:  http://bit.ly/XR_OpenRegenCalls

us-united-states.description:
We‚Äôre living in a time of global crisis, bearing witness to the effects of our government‚Äôs inability to respond to the existential threats of the climate and ecological emergency, the COVID-19 pandemic and the ravages of a long history of systemic racism. Facing these threats alone can be overwhelming.  Join us to hear how Extinction Rebellion is bringing people together to act now and avoid total climate breakdown.  
This talk will lay out the basic climate science that drives our urgency to act and outline how we can use nonviolent direct action to demand change. Whether you‚Äôre interested in joining Extinction Rebellion or just curious about what‚Äôs happening to the climate, come to hear more about what humanity is facing in the next decade, what has to happen to prevent catastrophe, and connect with others who are wrestling with these truths.   
Sign up here: https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZEqde2vqz4vE9Ir_Hg56qIN0vL6a33nUvtV

cz-vset√≠n.description:
- 2020 tied with 2016 as the world‚Äôs hottest year
- It‚Äôs 2021 and our politicians continue to invest in projects that harm our future
- 2021 is an election year, we need to be back in rebellion stronger than ever before
- We need you to help us grow the movement to have the impact we need

Join this workshop to explore how we can promote our talks, meetings, and actions online during the pandemic to bring back inactive rebels to the movement and to attract new people to join XR.

In March 2021, we are planning a national action that all rebels can do in their local cities and towns. This will be supported by a campaign of talks, trainings and meetings to grow the movement and our skills to bring people to XR. This includes delivering over 15 online Heading for Extinction talks by the end of March.

We need every rebel to get involved in outreach. Outreach is everyone‚Äôs role.  If everyone does a little outreach, together we can achieve a lot!

We are preparing this workshop to give you the inspiration, ideas and practical tips you need to get involved in outreach.

In this workshop we will explore:

Using the power of momentum driven organising 
Using the power of personal connections 
Using facebook for promotion and outreach
Online and email outreach 
How to organise ourselves to do outreach and promotion

us-vermont.description:
Join Extinction Rebellion Vermont this winter as we read "All We Can Save: Truth, Courage, and Solutions for the Climate Crisis," edited by Ayana Elizabeth Johnson & Katharine K. Wilkinson. A collection of "provocative and illuminating essays from women at the forefront of the climate movement who are harnessing truth, courage, and solutions to lead humanity forward."

Register here: https://forms.gle/dv2vLn1jQ7cSPcHW8

Details:

Wednesdays, 6:30 - 7:30pm, February 3, 10, 17, 24, March 3, 10, 17, 24, 31, April  7

Meet weekly via Zoom for 60 minutes over 10 weeks, reading a section of the book prior to each meeting (~40 pages/week).

**Space is limited to provide space for rich dialogue. If there is enough interest, we may offer an additional meeting time (likely a weekend morning).

Register here: https://forms.gle/dv2vLn1jQ7cSPcHW8

More about the book: "There is a renaissance blooming in the climate movement: leadership that is more characteristically feminine and more faithfully feminist, rooted in compassion, connection, creativity, and collaboration. While it‚Äôs clear that women and girls are vital voices and agents of change for this planet, they are too often missing from the proverbial ‚Äútable.‚Äù More than a problem of bias, it‚Äôs a dynamic that sets us up for failure. To change everything, we need everyone. Intermixing essays with poetry and art, this book is both a balm and a guide for knowing and holding what has been done to the world, while bolstering our resolve never to give up on each other or our collective future. We must summon truth, courage, and solutions, to turn away from the brink and toward life-giving possibility. Curated by two climate leaders, this book is a collection and celebration of visionaries who are leading us on a path toward all we can save." (Source: allwecansave.earth)

gb-oxford.description:
Register FREE for Zoom details: 
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/134260351325
The Silent Generation, baby boomers, Generation X, millennials, Gen Z -- we're all in the workforce together. How are our assumptions about each other holding us back from working and communicating better? Social psychologist Leah Georges shows how we're more similar than different and offers helpful tactics for navigating the multigenerational workplace.

We watch a TED video together then break into small groups for facilitated discussions, usually we get through four questions and groups reshuffled for each question.

at-klagenfurt.description:
Online Workshop zu aktuellen Aspekten der multiplen Krisen und einer mobilisierenden Kommunikation dar√ºber. :

Liebe Rebellinnen und Rebellen,

wir laden euch herzlich zum XR Lernraum: Science, Communication & Facilitation ein.

"Facilitation" bezieht sich auf uns selbst und auf die Menschen, mit denen wir kommunizieren. Wir wollen zugleich anderen und uns dabei helfen, √ºber die Themen von XR und √ºber XR selbst besser und aktivierender zu kommunizieren.  :speaking_head: 

Wir m√∂chten in diesem Raum unser Wissen √ºber die multiplen Krisen der Gegenwart gemeinsam vertiefen, mit dem Ziel, dieses Wissen auch mit Zielgruppen au√üerhalb unserer Bubble zu teilen. Wir wollen uns deshalb bei unseren Treffen

    - mit aktuellen Themen besch√§ftigen (durch Impulsvortr√§ge, Zusendung von Unterlagen, Unterst√ºtzung in der Recherchearbeit),
    - gemeinsam planen, eine bestimmte Gruppe zu einem Thema anzusprechen (z.B. Leute im privaten Umfeld, Kolleginnen und Kollegen, Journalist:innen, Politiker:innen, Menschen in der Landwirtschaft ...)
    - zusammen reflektieren, welchen Erfolg unsere Kommunikation hatte und was wir daraus lernen k√∂nnen.

Beispiel:
Wir entscheiden uns dazu, das Thema B√ºrger:innenr√§ten f√ºr die Kommunikation mit Menschen aufzubereiten, die in der Kommunalpolitik aktiv sind. Wir informieren uns selbst √ºber den Stand der Diskussion und planen, wen wir bei welcher Gelegenheit ansprechen (einzeln oder in kleinen Gruppen). Bei unserem n√§chsten Treffen berichten wir √ºber den Erfolg oder Misserfolg dieser Kommunikation und √ºberlegen, was gut funktioniert hat und wir besser machen k√∂nnen.

F√ºr jeden Abschnitt √ºberlegen wir uns also ein Thema, eine Zielgruppe und einen oder mehrere Kan√§le.

F√ºr den Gruppenprozess w√§re es vorteilhaft, wenn ihr an m√∂glichst allen vier Terminen teilnehmen k√∂nnt.

Vorschau f√ºr den 12.1.
Beim ersten Termin werden wir mit einen Impuls zum aktuellen Stand der Klimakrise starten.
Wir werden uns auch Zeit nehmen, uns gegenseitig kennen zu lernen und von euren Erfahrungen und vielleicht auch schon vorhandenen Ideen zu erfahren, wo ihr bereits konkrete Handlungsfelder seht.
Das Konzept f√ºr den Lernraum ist neu und wir m√∂chten es ausprobieren. Wir freuen und deshalb nicht nur, wenn ihr euch anmeldet und mitmacht, sondern auch, wenn ihr Vorschl√§ge und Kritik zur Gestaltung des Lernraums habt.

Wir freuen uns auf den gemeinsamen Weg des Erforschens, Lernens und Handelns! 

Anmeldung bitte bis So, 10.1.2021  unter info@xrebellion.at  

Liebe Gr√º√üe,

XR-Lernraum-Team

gb-peak-district.description:
Join us for this month's People's Assembly

New Year, New Rebels!
One of the biggest parts of growing our movement and increasing our impact is the welcoming of new rebels. On Wed 20 Jan we'll be chatting about:
  * What was your experience as a brand new rebel?
  * How do you welcome new rebels into your group?
  * How can we empower more rebels to pick up roles?

Come join us and share your experiences with your fellow rebels!

Sign up for the PA here: https://actionnetwork.org/events/assembly-new-year-new-rebels/

Everything discussed will be fed to the Communities and Rebel Pathways teams so that we can share the best ideas across the movement and try to support the needs which arise.

This session is part of a monthly program of assemblies run by the Communities Team to feed your needs into the work we do for you. We want to hear of successes and challenges you face in your local areas so that we can help each other!

UK Communities Assemblies - 3rd Wednesday of every month

au-adelaide.description:
Are you new to Extinction Rebellion or an old hand keen to refresh or re-ground your understanding of Extinction Rebellion DNA?


In this key 2-hour workshop we'll take a deep dive into XR culture exploring:
Our Three key Demands
Our Principles & Values - the basis of the Rebel Code under which we operate
Our story, strategy and theory of change
The growth of Extinction Rebellion has been explosive across the globe. Following from natural processes, Extinction Rebellion has a core ‚ÄòDNA‚Äô. This acts as the base for all our activities. The DNA includes: our demands, 10 principles and values, and our organisation structure. In this workshop you will learn more about these key characteristics of Extinction Rebellion and how you might fit into the growing Extinction Rebellion organism.

This workshop is the next step for those who‚Äôve seen our Heading for Extinction talk (can be watched online) and wish to contribute their skills and passion to the movement.

We are using the video conferencing tool Zoom for this event. Upon registering on Action Network you'll be provided with  Zoom login details. We'll also provide you with ways to contact us if you require technical support.

Note: times are in AEDT timezone GMT+11, ie, NSW/Vic/Tas daylight savings time.
